nodes.text: Diamond was an alias used by Facet Anamor.

Facet used the Diamond alias as part of her disguise as a bounty hunter working for the Galactic Empire on the planet Toprawa. It was while disguised as Diamond that Facet assassinated the Rebel leader Vermilion. Facet was unsuccessful, however, in her attempt to prevent the Rebel Alliance obtaining the Death Star superlaser plans and disappeared from public view soon after.
